description: Clipping of audio-. Cognates include Proto-Germanic *awiz (“obvious”), Sanskrit आविस् (āvís, “manifestly, evidently”) and Ancient Greek αἰσθάνομαι (aisthánomai, “perceive, notice”) whence English aesthetic.

adjectives.description: audio (comparative more audio, superlative most audio)

entries.meaning: Focused on audible sound, as opposed to sight.
A sound, or a sound signal
